column2: and he is travelling down through the Scottish highlands to Inverness
column3: tired and ever-so-slightly anxious in case he falls asleep between now and when the train reaches the station
column4: and misses his cue to say to Alice

column1: 1003|10.03|The date was the 14th of May and the clock on his desk said the time was twenty three minutes past ten
column2: so he tapped in the numbers 10.23. At least
column3: that's what he meant to do. In fact he typed in the numbers 10.03.
